description:
Ladies Package
Grandma and Fumi have come to a spa resort. Grandma complains about everything and Mom gets ticked off over time...
Glasses
Bunji`s best friend, Chi, is acting strange. What happened is Chi`s eyesight has become poor and he has to wear glasses from now on. He was embarrassed and was not able to wear them.
Flexible
Bunji, who is in the third grade, is hopeless when it comes to studying. Chi has started to go to cram school and Mom is in a dilemma over whether to send her son to one as well. That`s when the early stage education spirit shows up.
First Grade
Fumi, who is in first grade, is starting to act more like a big girl.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ladies Package / Glasses / Flexible / First Grade
レディースパック / メガネ / フレキシブル / 一年生
